content: प्रेर् {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To set in motion, move. {@--2@} To push or urge on, propel, impel, send forth; <ls>R. 4. 24.</ls> {%<ab>v. l.</ab>%} {@--3@} To incite, instigate, set on {@--4@} To cast, direct (as eyes); नयने यत्प्रेरयंत्या तया <ls>Ś. 2. 2.</ls> {@--5@} To throw, hurl. {@--6@} To send forth, despatch. {@--7@} To utter. {@--8@} To ask.
